import React from "react"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const calcTotal = (event) => { const targetDiv = event.target.closest(".invoice-details"); const qty = Array.from(targetDiv.children).filter( (el) => el.className === "quantity" || el.className === "unit-cost" ); const hmn = qty[0].value; console.log(qty); }; return (
